/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, a large body of water can be seen, adding a serene element to the bustling cityscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
